name: Camp Blackwood: The Game
description:
Camp Blackwood: The Game takes place at a summer camp with a murderous history. In this game, 1 player will take control of the slasher and hunt down 3 other players who are playing as campers.

The camper's goal is to escape, the slasher's goal is to kill as many campers as possible.

The game currently features 6 campers, and 4 slashers each with unique stats and abilities.

The game is local, same keyboard multiplayer with online multiplayer made possible through Parsec. The controls are as follows:

  • Camper 1: WASD for movement, R to interact.
  • Camper 2: YGHJ for movement, I to interact.
  • Camper 3: PL;' for movement, ] to interact.
  • Slasher: Arrow keys for movement, Control to attack.
